name: athletically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to sports and physical activities: As a child I was not athletically inclined, preferring instead to spend my time indoors with a book or a science project. Athletically active kids are less likely to develop health problems as adults.
in a strong and healthy way that is typical of someone who is good at sports: He was tall and athletically built, with the arms of a rower.
More examplesFewer examplesThe midfielder pivoted athletically to his left to evade the defender while still keeping control of the ball. As a diligent student and athletically gifted basketball player, she was eligible for a number of sports scholarships at prestigious universities.
